Tunable.name: NUM_SIDES
Tunable.description: The number of polygon sides to use when approximating a circle constraint.

Tunable.name: DEFAULT_FACING_RANGE
Tunable.description: The size of the angle-range that sims should use when determining facing constraints.

Tunable.name: MINIMUM_VALID_AREA
Tunable.description: The minimum area, in square meters, of the polygon for constraints to be considered valid (unless they have allow_small_intersections set).

Tunable.name: ROUTE_GOAL_COUNT_FOR_SCORING_FUNC
Tunable.display: Route Goal Count For Scoring Func
Tunable.description: The number of points to sample when routing to a simple constraint that can be scored natively.
